name: frameworks-performance
description: Gather performans metrics from apps written in different frameworks.

scripts.start:node: cd app/node && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.start:node-express: cd app/node-express && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.start:node-nest: cd app/node-nest && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run

author: Nikolay Shatalov <hwndept@gmail.com>
